name: Silent Retrieve 33
description:
Retrieve the radioactive stone without being caught!

Use A-D keys to move horizontally.

Use Space key to jump (press twice to double jump).

The game is only 2 levels, my first submission to my first game jam 😄 Resources
  • Game Design and Development 2: 2D Platformer course assignment assets
  • Magic Cliffs Environment by rawore00
  • Tiny Nin by ChurroGelato
  • Thaleah font by Tiny Worlds
